description: Manage your digital advertising spend with Looker
name: Digital Marketing

sections.description: These reports dive into your Google Ads to find ways to increase the ROI of your marketing spend. Use Opportunities to find quick wins, refine your targets using the Performance trend reports, or discover which audiences are falling off your funnel.
sections.name: Google Ads

pages.description: Take immediate action to optimize your marketing spend and improve results. These opportunity reports show you what to stop doing and what to do more of.
pages.name: Optimizations

pageSections.description: Increase your bids to take advantage for these well performing Ads, Keywords, and Ad Groups. They are ranking below the first position and have room to drive more conversions to you at a good price.
pageSections.name: Opportunities

reports.description: Increase the bid on these Ads to drive more conversions.
reports.name: Ad Opportunities

reports.description: Increase the bid on these Keywords to drive more conversions.
reports.name: Keyword Opportunities

reports.description: Increase the bid on these Ad Groups to drive more conversions.
reports.name: Ad Group Opportunities

pageSections.description: See Ad Groups, Keywords, and Ads that have had big performance changes recently. Use these to spot positive and negative trends and act on them.
pageSections.name: Big Movers

reports.description: Ads that have had recent big performance changes.
reports.name: Ad Performance Changes

reports.description: Keywords that have had recent big performance changes.
reports.name: Keyword Performance Changes

reports.description: Ad Groups that have had recent big performance changes.
reports.name: Ad Group Performance Changes

pageSections.description: Quickly find Ad Groups, Keywords, and Ads that are underperforming compared to their peers. Fix or pause underperformers to gain immediate improvements in your marketing spend.
pageSections.name: Underperforming

reports.description: Quickly find the ads that need to be paused or have their bid lowered.
reports.name: Underperforming Ads

reports.description: Quickly find the keywords that need to be paused or have their bid lowered.
reports.name: Underperforming Keywords

reports.description: Quickly find the ad groups that need to be paused or have their bid lowered.
reports.name: Underperforming Ad Groups

pageSections.description: We show you Ads and Keywords that are performing out of the bounds for your account. Pause or fix these immediately to improve performance.
pageSections.name: Alerts

reports.description: Pause or lower the bid of these ads. They are performing much lower than your other ads.
reports.name: Ad Alerts
